name: Spanish Chorizo Rice
keywords: Spanish Chorizo Rice, Chorizo, Bacon, Rice, Easy, Wine, Capsicum, Tomato, Flavorful, Rice Mashup, One-Pot Meal, Spanish Cuisine, Spicy Rice, Hearty, One-Pot Dish, Family Meal, Comfort Food, Budget-Friendly
description: Warm and exceptionally tasty rice mashup with chunks of delicious chorizo.
recipeIngredient: Handful of herbs (Oregano, Thyme, and Rosemary)

recipeInstructions.text: Fry chorizo and bacon until slightly crispy.
recipeInstructions.name: Fry Chorizo

recipeInstructions.text: Add onions and fry until soft.
recipeInstructions.name: Fry Onions

recipeInstructions.text: Add tomatoes, capsicum, garlic, and cook for about 5 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Add veg

recipeInstructions.text: Add the remaining ingredients except the fresh basil. Cook until the rice is tender (about 30 minutes). Add a little bit of water if it gets too dry for the rice to keep cooking.
recipeInstructions.name: Cook rice

recipeInstructions.text: Serve topped with fresh basil and enjoy!
recipeInstructions.name: Serve

notes: I like to enjoy mine with fresh chili and a nice dry red wine.
